data.title: Benjamin O. Davis, Jr. Age, Birthday, Zodiac Sign and Birth Chart
data.meta_description: Astrology details of Benjamin O. Davis, Jr. such as age, birthday, zodiac sign, and natal chart. Analyze their birth chart and kundli to understand their personality and cause of death through astrology.
data.text:
Benjamin O. Davis, Jr. was an American officer and pilot born on December 18, 1912, in Washington, D.C. He made significant contributions to the military and served during a pivotal time in U.S. history. His legacy is particularly noted for breaking racial barriers in the armed forces. Davis passed away on July 4, 2002, in the same city, after a battle with Alzheimer's disease.
